attributes.action: stop landlords putting families on welfare in private housing
attributes.additional_details:
ever since the right to buy was introduced we have lost large quantities of council housing and then with a number of recessions we have had to put up with the private sector being bought up by greedy landlords who have overpriced the rents and have caused havoc, you have to keep the private and the social housing apart communities throughout britain
have been torn apart VOTE TO STOP.

rejection.details: The type of accommodation that tenants occupy is a matter of individual choice.
